content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's quick and fun. I like it for Clash of Code.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: it is simple and it can be fun resolve it

Simple and clean ! Nice for a Fatest mode in my opinion
Might be funny in short mode too

At least  if you guys downvoted it let a message and explain why ... 

How would I know what's wrong with the exercice ? 

People are awesome AND SMART

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: He think we have we this exercice all we wait for a coc . We easly understand  what we have to do . Maybe the persons who could give up are the persons who don't know how to program with character or string .

Je pense que on as tous ce que on attend d'un coc . On comprend facilement ce qu'il faut faire . Peut -etre que les personnes qui pourrait abandonner sont les personnes qui ne savent pas du tout programmer avec des caractères ou des chaines de caractères .

1. "Pyramide" should be spelled as "pyramid".

2. Please write a clearer statement, or just change the clash into a reverse mode one.

3. If you are continuing with this clash in non-reverse modes, please refer to the example in the contribution guidelines on how to write and format the statement properly. https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/contribute---help/contribution-guidelines

4. Tests and validators should always be different.

Thanks.
